name: Occult Cables
description:
Note: There seems to be an issue with playing the game in fullscreen on 4K monitors in Chrome. Try using other browser.

There once was a CULTIST and they were attempting a mighty spell.

This spell was meant to ensure that their toast are never burnt and always just the right amount of crunchy.

But something went terribly wrong and now the toaster has been possesed by an OLD ONE called Shub-Niggurath. 

All an OLD ONE needs to conquer our universe is to plug itself into electricity.

You have to stop that at all costs!

CONTROLS
Red player – WASD
Blue player – ARROW KEYS 

MADE BY
Antonín Holík @TondaFSCZ
Kuba Špiřík @KubaSpirik
Jan Szlauer @bearinyourheart
